directions: Place the tuna in a small bowl.  Pour peanut oil over, sprinkle with the wasabi fumi furikake, and wasabi powder. Stir well, cover, and refrigerate until serving.
To serve, press half of the mixture into a 1/2 cup container and unmold onto a bed of greens. Repeat for second portion.
ingredients: 8 ounces high quality ahi tuna, cut into 1/4 inch dice
title: Wasabi Ahi Tuna Tartare
